content.raw: No, I don't have a good suggestion. Configuration file storage is currently a giant mess in my view, and we need to discuss/create a standard across all the programs (as well as standardise on labconfig vs program config vs config for a particular experiment in a particular program). I would probably avoid creating a new folder to put things in, if only because the location will probably change once we sort this all out, and I'd rather not have lots of dead folders hanging around in people's installs (and programmatic deletion of folders is risky).
